about_the_game:
Want to keep up with the latest news about the game? Join the Discord community on the right side of the shop page and follow us!

Today, we've released the latest demo version of the game, so feel free to try it out!

Break Siege is a train-themed deck-building rougelike game in which you constantly construct your own deck and breakthrough forces of the Empire in intense, real-time battles.

・In order to complete the important mission given to you by the Rebel, you must drive an interstellar train that can travel between different planets, breakthrough forces of the Empire's resistance, and ultimately complete your mission.

Travel Between Planets, Embark on adventures

・Each playthrough is a new procedurally-generated adventure, traveling from planet to planet in a variety of styles, encountering all sorts of unexpected events, acquiring equipment to strengthen your train, and recruiting all sorts of mercenaries to join your team.

・Every route is brimming with possibilities. Will you tread carefully or dance on the razor’s edge? The decision is yours to make!

Experience unique battle mode, enjoy card game thrill

・Unlike turn-based combat, real-time battles are more intense, thrilling, and smooth.

・Combined with deck-building, it offers you a completely different combat experience.

Mind-bending card combo tactics, unique deck-building.

・Each train offers a rich and unique selection of cards for you to choose from.

・Familiarize yourself with the special effects and mechanics of each card to master your battles with ease.

Break Siege, breakthrough, embrace victory.

・Failure is not the end; every adventure is a journey towards becoming legendary.

・With each adventure, unlock different cards, mercenaries, and abilities that will become your boost to break through the sieges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: 《Break Siege》It is a card-building Rogue game themed around trains, where players construct their own decks to overcome the relentless resistance of the Imperial Army in thrilling real-time battles.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
